content.description: The following question refers to the topic of Romanticism.
content.question: Which of the following best explains Rousseauâ€™s importance to the development of Romanticism?

choices.label: He questioned the assertion of the equal rights of women.
He believed that society was based on a social contract.
He emphasized the role of emotions in moral improvement.
He published one of the first confessional autobiographies.

content.answer: He emphasized the role of emotions in moral improvement.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
